Title: Removes provisions of the election law requiring election inspectors, poll clerks, and election coordinators to be appointed in a bipartisan manner
Summary: Removes provisions requiring election inspectors, poll clerks, and election coordinators to be appointed in a bipartisan manner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to removing provisions of such law requiring election inspectors, poll clerks, and election coordinators to be appointed in a bipartisan manner
